title: Bakerman
brief_description: Directed and shot by Lars Von Trier, this one-take music video features the artists from Danish electro group Laid Back playing their instruments while sky-diving.

constellations_other.name: A handheld aesthetic
constellations_other.description: Looking at the use of handycams and other consumer level devices in moving image works.

description: Directed and shot by Lars Von Trier, this one-take music video features the artists from Danish electro group Laid Back playing their instruments while sky-diving.
